search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Trainual (trainual.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Trainual is: [https://trainual.com/pricing](https://trainual.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Trainual | Find the right plan for your business

extracted_content.content:

Find the right plan for your business
=====================================

![Image 9](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/64ecac0899955dd93d6b9af5_SaveWithYearly.svg)[Monthly Yearly ![Image 10](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/645ab305fc8d7372f6ea1b74_SaveWthYearly.svg)](https://trainual.com/pricing#)

[Talk with sales](https://trainual.com/pricing#)

[Talk with sales](https://trainual.com/pricing#)

*   Customized implementation

Customize your plan with optional add-ons
-----------------------------------------

A la carte options:

![Image 11](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/674e80cddbe3f02599bb485b_start_8px.svg)

Premium courses

Ensure employee and HR compliance for your industry, region, and company size with unlimited access to 350+ pre-built courses — created by experts, ready to share, and centralized with the rest of your company need-to-knows.

Starting at

+$104/month

Unlimited e-signatures

Collect legally-binding e-signatures from employees, ensuring that they understand and agree to any policy or process in your account.

Starting at

+$29/month

Custom domain

Get easy account access — plus level up the branding and professionalism of your training — with a custom account domain.

+$14/month

The power-user package:

Trainual+

Get every premium feature, including—

Training paths

Unlimited e-signatures

Train in other languages

Custom domain

Delegation Planner™

Hosted videos

Starting at

+$49/month

[Get a demo](https://trainual.com/pricing#)[Learn more about Trainual+](https://trainual.com/plus)

Everything you need to organize and scale💡
-------------------------------------------

Unlimited documentation

Document all your processes, policies, and SOPs in a simple, searchable, step-by-step playbook.

Built-in AI capabilities

Generate your processes and policies with the click of a button. Use AI-assisted search to surface answers to questions. Plus, automatically map out roles and responsibilities based on industry best practices.

Testing, tracking, & reporting

Add unlimited multiple-choice and open-ended tests to your training content to boost comprehension and accountability. Plus, see your complete team's training stats in one snapshot view and even export them as a .csv or .pdf for future review.

Mobile app & browser extension

Access your playbook on the go with our native mobile apps. Plus, search content and find important information directly from Chrome with the Trainual Chrome Extension.

Custom branding

Make your training content more “you” by adding your logo, company colors, fonts and other brand styles.

Built-in screen recording

Easily capture your screen, video, and audio in up to 25 free embedded recordings powered by Loom, from right inside the Trainual editor.

Share content with anyone

Public Share allows you to share any subject you create with anyone (even if they don’t have a formal seat in your Trainual account).

Single sign-on (SSO)

Enable single sign-on to connect Trainual with your Okta or Microsoft Azure SSO accounts.

Premium integrations

Automatically add new employees to your Trainual account when they get onboarded to your HR systems. Integrations include Gusto, Zenefits, BambooHR, Justworks, and more.

Automatic time estimates

Trainual will let you know how long each assigned training will take so your team knows when to get to those how-to's, while working around all their to-do's.

Unlimited chat & email support

Access our best-in-class support team whenever you need us.

Customizable templates

Access to over 400 customizable process and policy templates built for small businesses.

Team directory

Build a beautiful directory with bios for everyone on the team.

Org chart & role chart

Connect the dots between people, teams, and responsibilities with the interactive and visual org chart and role chart builders.

Roles & responsibilities builder

Create the framework for every role in your business. Create lists of responsibilities for every role. Then connect responsibilities to your documented training.

Embed hundreds of content types

Easily add GIFs, videos, graphics, or any other type of rich media to your playbook by dropping a link to it. Look for the lightning bolt inside the editor to access all the integrations for embedding.

Version history

Restore and view content up to 30 days old for peace of mind and visibility of how your training evolves over time._\*All-time version history only available in Trainual+_

\[Add-on\]

Premium courses

Ensure employee and HR compliance for your industry, region, and more with unlimited access to 350+ pre-built courses — created by experts, ready to share, and centralized with the rest of your company need-to-knows.

\[Add-on\]

Custom domains

Get easy access to Trainual with a custom domain. Perfect for businesses that want leveled-up professionalism and branding for their training and documentation.

\[Add-on\]

Unlimited e-signatures

Collect legally-binding e-signatures from employees, ensuring that they understand and agree to all your policies and processes.

\[Add-on\]

Delegation Planner™

A visual way to manage shifting responsibilities as your team grows and changes. Helping you determine where employees should (and shouldn’t) spend their time — and delegate responsibilities accordingly.

\*Only available in Trainual+.

\[Add-on\]

Train in other languages

Translate your whole account to English, Spanish, French, German, or Portuguese.

\*Only available in Trainual+.

\[Add-on\]

Training paths

Maximize productivity and prevent information overload during onboarding. Just design personalized training schedules where you can control the flow, sequence, and pace of learning.

\*Only available in Trainual+.

\[Add-on\]

Hosted videos

Drag and drop an unlimited number of training videos right into your processes and policies for ease of setup and watch requirement options.

\*Only available in Trainual+.

### See Trainual in action

[Get a demo](https://trainual.com/pricing#)

![Image 12](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/61aa482275701e421456dbde_Arrow.svg)![Image 13](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/61aa482275701e133a56dbe2_ArrowMobile.svg)![Image 14](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/61aa482275701e265f56dbdd_Star.svg)

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

![Image 15: Dropdown arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/61aa482275701e61cc56dbe8_DropdownDark.svg)

##### Who is Trainual for?

Trainual is for anybody who needs to get their business out of their brain, to train and scale their teams. If your training content is scattered all over the place and you're struggling to delegate responsibilities, Trainual is for you! Our typical customer is a small to medium size business with 5-500 employees. Trainual is a favorite among entrepreneurs and CEOs, HR and Operations leaders, office managers and admins, because Trainual helps standardize the way work gets done, streamline onboarding and training processes, ensure all employees have the knowledge they need to do their best work, and keep teams aligned and accountable no matter where they work from. Trainual is not an enterprise tool, though there are teams in the thousands who find success with Trainual for specific use cases. Get in touch to learn more about Trainual and how it might work for your type of business and use cases.

![Image 16: Dropdown arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/61aa482275701e61cc56dbe8_DropdownDark.svg)

##### Is there a free trial period?

Yes! You can try any Trainual plan free for 7-days by simply setting up a password. No credit card needed.

![Image 17: Dropdown arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/61aa482275701e61cc56dbe8_DropdownDark.svg)

##### Is Trainual hard to use?

Nope! Trainual is super intuitive. In fact, Trainual has been voted "#1 Easiest To Use" small business onboarding, training, and SOP software by reviewers on G2 every year since 2019. Adding your team is quick, building your content is as easy as writing an email, and rolling out training happens in just a few clicks. Now, we're not saying it doesn't take time! Documenting stuff about your business isn't the most automated of processes...though our AI writing feature does help speed things up! But the time you put in, you get back ten-fold. And to get back to the question, no it's not hard to use :)

![Image 18: Dropdown arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/61aa482275701e61cc56dbe8_DropdownDark.svg)

##### Does it take a long time to create training content?

Not anymore! If you have existing training content, you can now import a Google Doc or Word file directly into Trainual. Or, if you're starting from scratch, you can leverage the build-in AI capabilities to generate new content by prompting our 🪄 Compose feature with a few bullet points. Need a little inspiration? We also have hundreds of templates for you to get started with. Documenting your business playbook does take time, but we promise to make it as easy and painless as possible.

![Image 19: Dropdown arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/61aa482275701e61cc56dbe8_DropdownDark.svg)

##### If you had one shot, one opportunity, to seize everything you ever wanted, would you capture it?

Yes, we would. And hope you would too!

![Image 20: Dropdown arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/61aa482275701e61cc56dbe8_DropdownDark.svg)

##### Does Trainual host media?

It’s simple to copy your existing training content (documents and photos) into your Trainual team curriculum. Videos must be hosted elsewhere (Vimeo, Wistia, YouTube) and can be embedded into Trainual.

![Image 21: Dropdown arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/61aa482275701e61cc56dbe8_DropdownDark.svg)

##### Can I have more than one account admin?

Yes! You can grant admin permissions to enable other users to assign or edit content, as well as creator permissions for certain users to edit content without overseeing users in the system.

![Image 22: Dropdown arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/61aa482275701e61cc56dbe8_DropdownDark.svg)

##### What if I want to change plans?

Account owners or billing admins can quickly and easily change plans from within the app.

![Image 23: Dropdown arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/61aa482275701e61cc56dbe8_DropdownDark.svg)

##### Is Trainual safe and secure?

Absolutely. The Trainual app is totally secure and only team members you assign as users can access your internal account content. If someone leaves the company, it’s just as easy to remove them from the system. And each user can be assigned different roles bases on permissions. All of our data is stored on a cloud-based server and database that is PCI Level 1 compliant and backed up daily. All uploaded images and files are stored with Amazon Web Services (AWS) S3 cloud storage.

![Image 24: Dropdown arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/61aa482275701e61cc56dbe8_DropdownDark.svg)

##### Does Trainual share my data?

We will not sell, rent, exchange or share your personal information with any third-parties without your permission.

Trainual will share the collected information in order to respond to investigation, court orders, legal process, or to investigate, prevent or take action regarding illegal activities, suspected fraud, or situations involving potential threats to the physical safety of any person, violations of Trainual’s terms of service, or as otherwise required by law. Trainual may use your data for operational necessities such as processing and fulfilling your order, billing, service improvement, and other general purposes.

If Trainual is involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of its assets, you will be notified via email and/or a prominent notice on our website of any change in ownership or uses of your personal information, as well as any choices you may have regarding your personal information.

Please reference our [Privacy Policy](https://trainual.com/privacy) for complete details.

‍

![Image 25: Dropdown arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/61aa482275701e61cc56dbe8_DropdownDark.svg)

##### What forms of payment do you accept?

We accept all major credit cards, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.

![Image 26: Dropdown arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/61aa482275701e61cc56dbe8_DropdownDark.svg)

##### Can I cancel my subscription?

Yes, you have the option to cancel or pause your subscription (put your account on hold) at any time. Cancelling your plan comes into effect the following month. If you pause, you can restart whenever you’re ready to start training again!

![Image 27: Dropdown arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/61aa482275701e61cc56dbe8_DropdownDark.svg)

##### Do you offer refunds?

In most cases, no, we do not offer refunds. However, you can cancel your account at any time, and you can try the platform for free with our 7-day free trial, no credit card necessary.

![Image 28: Dropdown arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61aa482275701e897156da77/61aa482275701e61cc56dbe8_DropdownDark.svg)

##### Does Trainual offer discounts to non-profits?

Yes! We offer a 50% discount to qualified nonprofit organizations. [You can learn more here.](https://trainual.com/non-profit-application)

##### Still got questions? We'd love to answer them.

[Get in touch](https://trainual.com/pricing#)
